title: Discussion-Based Project Learning for Online Learning Community Formation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Builds online learning communities through discussion-based learning and project collaboration in smartphone-based limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can proactively propose discussion topics at least three times in online forums within six months.
Learners can incorporate peer feedback into project stages at an 80% or higher rate through interaction with fellow learners.
Learners can analyze interaction patterns in learning communities using Social Network Analysis (SNA) techniques.

resources: Mobile-friendly collaboration tools (Google Docs, Slack, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
